replies.body: FINALLY  a teemo skin that reveals his true self

I have a couple bugs that i revealed that were never looked at.. Darkfrost Anivia's spawn animation freezes if i /j whilist the spawn animation is still playing.
And all those sound fixes are here, but they didn't fix snow day malzahar's sound loss when his e hits another unit.
Nor did they address the overly annoying repetitive sound effect of sejuani's bristle growling from her abilities.
